title: WOULDNT LET ME REMAKE AND I LOST LP RIOT

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: it was the game above, we had an illaoi that dindt reconnect until 10 minutes into the game, but before hand teh game wouldnt let us remake which is total bs and of course lost us the game. we as a team kept trying but it said she was connect which she wasnt she hadnt even bought items yet and was standing still in the same place for over 10 minutes, i want my next lost prevented. i know you can do that, becuase i have have had two similar issues and you guys did it for me, so pls look into this glitch.

replies.body:
Even though this loss really sucks, loss prevented is Riot's way of compensating for server issues so I'm not what happened in the past when you mentioned getting it activated for your games. Remakes only activate under these circumstances, so I'm curious what happened when someone tried starting the remake?  It's possible it didn't activate if that Illaoi was constantly reconnecting and disconnecting. Check over the rules for remakes and let me know if anything stands out.

https://i.gyazo.com/20e8b3825d5e149837cf23ac689995de.png

none of those rules explain why the game wouldnt let us remake, i dont see the first blood rule being the issue because there was no kill until  long after we tried to remake, so i dont get why the game thought she was connected and she was inactive for over 10 minutes before she reconnected, so this is really puzzling me, rough start to the season.
